title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Enhancing Mathematical Expertise Through Workplace Learning: Self-Regulated Learning Support

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics curriculum knowledge and teaching experience, basic online learning tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can complete math lesson improvement tasks by applying self-regulated learning strategies (goal setting, time management, self-assessment) in workplace learning environments.
Learners can analyze math education problems in real classroom settings, develop evidence-based solutions, and reflect on implementation outcomes.
Learners can share workplace learning experiences and build professional development portfolios through online collaboration with peer teachers.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
